results.firPara: Borussia Mönchengladbach arrived in Glasgow depleted but left with three points. Celtics hopes of even a Europa League place beyond Christmas were thereby dealt a severe blow, the most jarring thing for Brendan Rodgers perhaps the vast gulf between the supposedly disjointed Bundesliga team and their hitherto buoyant hosts.
results.secPara: Curiously, in a game where one teams overall dominance was so pronounced, there was a fall guy. Kolo Touré was horribly culpable for both of Mönchengladbachs goals, with Rodgers forced to defend the former Liverpool player thereafter. Nobody will be more disappointed than Kolo, the Celtic manager said. Tonight will hurt him. But he is a warrior, he is mentally tough and he will recover.
results.webTitle: Celtic thwarted as Lars Stindl and André Hahn strike for Mönchengladbach

results.firPara: Borussia Mönchengladbach leapfrogged Celtic into third place in Group C after two mistakes from Kolo Touré allowed Lars Stindl and André Hahn to score
results.secPara: And heres Ewan Murrays report from Parkhead
results.webTitle: Celtic 0-2 Borussia Mönchengladbach: Champions League – as it happened

results.firPara: Arsenals progress, at home and abroad, remains serene. It says everything about this thrashing of Ludogorets Razgrad that Arsène Wengers side did not have to be at their upbeat best to inflict it on opponents whose defensive resistance started shakily and disintegrated entirely thereafter. A seventh successive victory in all competitions, completed by the first senior hat-trick of Mesut Özils glittering career, always felt assured and has left them on the verge of the knockout phase. This team is irresistible.
results.secPara: Given the context of Ludogorets pitiful fragility, as Wenger acknowledged, Arsenal could brush off the odd pang of anxiety endured by their own backline. There was no cause for concern when contending with marking as lax as this and, in Vladislav Stoyanov, a goalkeeper whose confidence was shattered from the outset. Özil made all three of his rewards appear simple when lesser mortals might have snatched at the opportunities. It looks like he has the taste for goals, Wenger said. We wanted him to be a provider and a scorer but, before, he only liked to provide. Hes slowly moving towards that better balance.
results.webTitle: Mesut Özil scores Arsenal hat-trick and Sánchez chips in to beat  Ludogorets 6-0

results.firPara: Lionel Messi scored a hat-trick as Barcelona thumped Pep Guardiolas side, who lost Claudio Bravo to a farcical red card
results.secPara: Lionel Messi scored a hat-trick as Barcelona thumped Pep Guardiolas side, who lost Claudio Bravo to a farcical red card
results.webTitle: Barcelona v Manchester City: Champions League – as it happened

results.firPara: And heres Dominic Fifields match report
results.secPara: Ludogorets defence disintegrated in the second half, and their keeper was brittle all game, but the visitors still showed enough here to confirm they are a decentish team, especially going forward. Beating them 6-0 should not be sniffed at it, and beating them away will not be straightforward.
results.webTitle: Arsenal v Ludogorets: Champions League – as it happened

results.firPara: Hosts Gabon were handed a favourable draw for Januarys Africa Cup of Nations, with Pierre-Emerick Aubameyangs side to face Cameroon, Burkina Faso and the debutants Guinea-Bissau in Group A while the heavyweights Algeria and Senegal will face off in Group B.
results.secPara: The buildup to the tournament, which begins on 14 January, has been dominated by doubts over where it will be staged as the aftershocks of Gabonese presidential elections continue to be felt.
results.webTitle: 2017 Africa Cup of Nations draw: Algeria and Senegal face off in Group B

results.firPara: For Frank de Boer, Tuesdays edition of the Gazzetta dello Sport would not have made comfortable reading. Fresh from the home defeat against Cagliari on Sunday that left Internazionale marooned in mid-table, the famous pink paper reported that the Dutchmans future at San Siro is already under major scrutiny from the clubs new Chinese owners just over two months after he was appointed.
results.secPara: Many of the Suning society cannot wait any longer, read the editorial. De Boer is under examination and it is time to show that he deserves to be on the Nerazzurri bench.
results.webTitle: Frank de Boer feeling the heat at Inter as new era falls flat | Ed Aarons

results.firPara: Leeds United have led the tributes to their former goalkeeper Gary Sprake, who died on Wednesday at the age of 71.
results.secPara: A member of Don Revies Leeds side which won the First Division title in 1969, Sprake went on to play for Birmingham at the end of his career and won 37 caps for Wales.
results.webTitle: Former Leeds and Wales goalkeeper Gary Sprake dies aged 71

results.firPara: Vladimir Putin, the Russian president, replaced the nations sports minister Vitaly Mutko with his deputy on Wednesday, in a move possibly aimed at getting the controversial minister out of the international limelight prior to the 2018 World Cup.
results.secPara: However, the move is not a demotion Mutko has in fact been promoted to a newly created role, that of deputy prime minister responsible for sport, tourism and youth policy. Mutko has been hit by scandal after scandal during his tenure, most notably the allegations of a widespread state-sponsored doping system under his watch, but he has always remained untouchable.
results.webTitle: Vitaly Mutko promoted to newly created Russian deputy prime minister role

results.firPara: In todays Fiver the Brownlee derby, Rotherham and mocking Him
results.secPara: In todays Fiver the Brownlee derby, Rotherham and mocking Him
